text.div:
Glucose Tolerance Test Results

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    14995-5 Glucose [Moles/volume] in Serum or Plasma --2 hours post 75 g glucose PO
    1501-6 Glucose [Mass/volume] in Serum or Plasma --1 hour post 100 g glucose PO
    1507-3 Glucose [Mass/volume] in Serum or Plasma --1 hour post 75 g glucose PO
    1514-9 Glucose [Mass/volume] in Serum or Plasma --2 hours post 100 g glucose PO
    1518-0 Glucose [Mass/volume] in Serum or Plasma --2 hours post 75 g glucose PO
    1521-4 Glucose [Mass/volume] in Serum or Plasma --2 hours post meal
    1525-5 Glucose [Mass/volume] in Serum or Plasma --30 minutes post 100 g glucose PO
    1527-1 Glucose [Mass/volume] in Serum or Plasma --30 minutes post 75 g glucose PO
    1530-5 Glucose [Mass/volume] in Serum or Plasma --3 hours post 100 g glucose PO
    1533-9 Glucose [Mass/volume] in Serum or Plasma --3 hours post 75 g glucose PO
    1537-0 Glucose [Mass/volume] in Serum or Plasma --4 hours post 100 g glucose PO
    1540-4 Glucose [Mass/volume] in Serum or Plasma --5 hours post 100 g glucose PO
    1549-5 Glucose [Mass/volume] in Serum or Plasma --pre 100 g glucose PO
    20436-2 Glucose [Mass/volume] in Serum or Plasma --2 hours post dose glucose
    25665-1 Glucose [Moles/volume] in Serum or Plasma --1 hour post XXX challenge
    25668-5 Glucose [Moles/volume] in Serum or Plasma --2 hours post XXX challenge
    25679-2 Glucose [Moles/volume] in Serum or Plasma --1.5 hours post XXX challenge
    49689-3 Glucose tolerance [Interpretation] in Serum or Plasma Narrative--post 100 g glucose PO
    6689-4 Glucose [Mass/volume] in Blood --2 hours post meal
    72171-2 Glucose tolerance 2 hours panel - Serum or Plasma
